stages.logText: Umar told me to visit Defy in Sullengard to give their share to the villagers.
Defy told me that there will be a delay, for unknown reason, in giving the share of villagers in Sullengard. I must report this to Umar at once.
Umar instructed me to talk to Defy once more.
I reported back to Umar about Defy's disappearance together with his men. But Umar didn't believe me and he even sent me back to find them. I better ask the villagers there.
There was a distress man, whom just got a firstborn child, hinted me of wherabouts Defy and his men. I must report this to Umar once more.
Umar enraged because of Defy's traitorous while Sullengard is running in financial trouble.
Umar gave me a task to give the mayor atleast 1.7 Million gold coins as a promised share for their living. After that, I'm instructed to report back immediately.
At last, Sullengard can now sleep calmly and eat sufficiently with their financial loss restored. I can now rest from my back and forth long travel.
